Our vessel management platform works sea: Our vessel management platform works seamlessly across all devices, so you only have to set it up once, and get beautiful results forever. Complete financial control and operational efficiency.
Everything you need to manage your vesse: Everything you need to manage your vessel operations efficiently. From financial control to crew management, we've got you covered.
Complete vessel registry with specificat: Complete vessel registry with specifications and maintenance tracking. Manage your entire fleet from one centralized platform.
Manage crew members, positions, and auto: Manage crew members, positions, and automated salary payments. Streamline your human resources operations.
Income, expenses, transfers with automat: Income, expenses, transfers with automatic VAT calculations. Full financial transparency and control.
Financial reports, cash flow statements,: Financial reports, cash flow statements, and VAT reports. Make data-driven decisions with comprehensive analytics.
Schedule and track vessel maintenance to: Schedule and track vessel maintenance to ensure optimal performance and compliance with regulations.
Real-time insights into your operations: Real-time insights into your operations with customizable dashboards and visual analytics.
Streamlined processes designed to save y: Streamlined processes designed to save you time and reduce errors. Experience the power of automation.
Get real-time analytics and insights int: Get real-time analytics and insights into your vessel operations. Make informed decisions based on comprehensive data visualization and reporting tools.
Automate repetitive tasks and focus on w: Automate repetitive tasks and focus on what matters most. Our workflow engine handles complex processes seamlessly, reducing manual work and errors.
Keep your entire team in sync with real-: Keep your entire team in sync with real-time updates and collaborative tools. Share information instantly and work together efficiently.
See what our customers have to say about: See what our customers have to say about their experience with Bindamy Mareas.
Bindamy Mareas has transformed how we ma: Bindamy Mareas has transformed how we manage our fishing fleet. The financial control and reporting capabilities are outstanding.
The crew management system saves us hour: The crew management system saves us hours every week. Automated salary calculations and position tracking are game-changers.
Best investment we've made for our opera: Best investment we've made for our operations. The system is intuitive, powerful, and has improved our efficiency significantly.
Contact us for a personalized demo and p: Contact us for a personalized demo and pricing information.
Manage crew members, positions, and auto: Manage crew members, positions, and automated salary payments. Track crew movements and calculate salaries based on fishing trips and distribution profiles.
Register all income, expenses, and trans: Register all income, expenses, and transfers with automatic VAT calculations. Complete financial transparency with real-time balance tracking across multiple bank accounts.
Control fishing trips from departure to: Control fishing trips from departure to return. Register catch details, crew participation, and calculate distribution profiles automatically. Track everything from sea to port.
Generate comprehensive financial reports: Generate comprehensive financial reports, cash flow statements, and VAT reports. Export everything to PDF for documentation and compliance.
Automatic email notifications for all im: Automatic email notifications for all important events. Get notified about transactions, mareas completion, maintenance schedules, and more.
Granular permission system with vessel-s: Granular permission system with vessel-specific roles. Control who can view, edit, or manage different aspects of your operations.
Monitor everything with comprehensive au: Monitor everything with comprehensive audit logging. Track all changes, user actions, and system events for complete transparency and compliance.
Create custom distribution profiles for: Create custom distribution profiles for mareas. Automatically calculate crew payments based on catch, positions, and predefined rules.
Automate recurring payments like salarie: Automate recurring payments like salaries, insurance, and maintenance. Set it once and let the system handle the rest.
From vessel departure to return, track e: From vessel departure to return, track everything. Register fishing trips, calculate distributions, manage finances, and monitor all operations in real-time.
Track vessels from departure to return. Register catch details, crew participation, and automatically calculate distribution profiles. Everything is recorded and monitored.
Register all financial movements with au: Register all financial movements with automatic VAT calculations. Track balances across multiple bank accounts. Export reports to PDF for documentation and compliance.
Automatically calculate crew salaries ba: Automatically calculate crew salaries based on fishing trips and distribution profiles. Track crew movements and positions. Everything is calculated and documented automatically.
Monitor everything with comprehensive au: Monitor everything with comprehensive audit logging. Control access with vessel-specific permissions and roles. Get email notifications for all important events. Export everything to PDF.

Send technical notices and support messa: Send technical notices and support messages
Respond to your comments and questions: Respond to your comments and questions

We retain your information for as long a: We retain your information for as long as necessary to provide our services and comply with legal obligations.
Object to processing of your data: Object to processing of your data
